text:
Teen Mom has had its fair share of shocking moments that have left viewers speechless. Here are some of the most talked-about and disturbing moments from the show, as shared by Redditors:

Road Rage Incident: Jenelle pulled a gun on someone while driving with her son Jace in the car. "When Jenelle followed someone home after they break checked her. Then she pulled a gun on this person while Jace was in the car."

Jace's Rainbow Song: Jace sang the rainbow song to cope while Jenelle cried about her relationship issues. "When Jace is in the back seat of Jenelles car as she cry’s to him about Nathan not treating her good, and Jace dissociates and starts singing the rainbow song."
title: The heart of the internet
